--등록유형 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_COL A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DDL_COL_ID, A.DDL_TBL_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.DDL_COL_ID) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end , MAX(B.DDL_COL_ID) , MAX(B.DDL_TBL_ID) FROM WAM_DDL_COL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TBL D ON C.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = D.DDL_TBL_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') AND B.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE WAQ_DDL_COL SET DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN = 'N' , NONUL_UPD_YN = 'N' , DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN = 'N' , COL_UPD_YN = 'N' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--DATA TYPE 업데이드 여부 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_COL A SET DATA_TYPE_UPD_YN = 'Y' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM
AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} JOIN WAM_DDL_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM
AND NOT( NVL(A.DATA_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.DATA_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.DATA_LEN, 0) = NVL(D.DATA_LEN, 0) AND NVL(A.DATA_SCAL, 0) = NVL(D.DATA_SCAL, 0) )
)

--NOT NULL 업데이트 여부 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_COL A SET NONUL_UPD_YN = 'Y' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} JOIN WAM_DDL_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM AND NOT( NVL(A.NONUL_YN, 'N') = NVL(D.NONUL_YN, 'N') )
)

--Default value 업데이트 여부 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_COL A SET DEFLT_VAL_UPD_YN = 'Y' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL B JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND C.DDL_TBL_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM
AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} JOIN WAM_DDL_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = A.DDL_COL_PNM
AND NOT( NVL(A.DEFLT_VAL, '_') = NVL(D.DEFLT_VAL, '_') )
